name: Wake Up (itch) (Helluys)
description:
WakeUp !

Help Gwendal to wake up before he dies out of fear

Instructions :

  • Move around with Z-Q-S-D (sorry, forgot to reconfigure for you ! you may use arrows instead)
  • Interact with E when suggested
  • Find the way to wake up before it is too late
  • Avoid getting caught by monsters !

Lots of details could be improved, we submitted in a rush (8 sec to deadline!), but the concept is there

Hope you will enjoy Wake Up

Made by Kiruko, Ben, Helluys
